trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4SUB2_00579_MAOLADD_000_000<tab>I'm working to improve the strains of fruit we grow. There's nothing like a sweet and succulent morsel to lift the people's spirits.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4SUB2_00579_MAOLADD_000_010<tab>Captain! I'll do my utmost to bring pride to the name of the...ahem, Samiel Search Squad!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4SUB2_00579_MAOLADD_000_020<tab>Please accept my apologies again for the trouble I caused. I promise not to go running off again, and focus instead on doing what I do best─analyzing specimens.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4SUB2_00579_MAOLADD_000_030<tab>Yalana puts on a show of displeasure when the chief comes around with a request, but it's mainly to keep up appearances. She actually relishes the work.
